      • checkModelName

        public static boolean checkModelName(java.lang.String name)
                              throws IllegalNameException
        Check if the given name meet the model name convention.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be verified.
        Returns:
        true - if the name is valid.
        false - if the name is invalid.
        Throws:
        IllegalNameException - Thrown if the verifying name is invalid.

      • checkAttributeName

        public static boolean checkAttributeName(java.lang.String name)
                                  throws IllegalNameException
        Check if the given name meet the attribute name convention.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be verified.
        Returns:
        true - if the name is valid.
        false - if the name is invalid.
        Throws:
        IllegalNameException - Thrown if the verifying name is invalid.

      • checkFileExists

        public static boolean checkFileExists(java.lang.String filePath)
        Check whether the given file exists.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path for the file.
        Returns:
        True, if file exists, false otherwise.

      • generateId

        public static java.lang.String generateId(java.lang.String name)
        Create new Id by appending a timestamp to the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name that will be used to generate the id.
        Returns:
        An Id that is a combination of the name passed with the time stamp.

      • getDocumentXMLString

        public static java.lang.String getDocumentXMLString(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Convert the document node to string.
        Parameters:
        document - Document which needs to be converted to String.
        Returns:
        String for the given document.

      • getIdFromModel

        public static java.lang.String getIdFromModel(NamedObj model)
        Extra the PTDB model id from a given Ptolemy model.
        Parameters:
        model - The model to be extracted the id.
        Returns:
        The id of the model in the database. If that model hasn't been stored in the database yet, return null.

      • getPropertyString

        public static java.lang.String getPropertyString(java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                 java.lang.String propertyValue)
        Create the property node string to add to a MOML with the class as StringConstantParameter.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - Name for the property.
        propertyValue - Value for the property.
        Returns:
        Property node string for the given name and value.

      • getValueForAttribute

        public static java.lang.String getValueForAttribute(org.w3c.dom.Node currentNode,
                                                    java.lang.String attributeName)
        Get the value for the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        currentNode - Node for which attribute value needs to be determined.
        attributeName - Name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        Return the value for the given attribute. Return null if attribute not present for the given node.

      • insertIdTagToModelBody

        public static java.lang.String insertIdTagToModelBody(java.lang.String modelBody,
                                                      java.lang.String modelId)
        Add a parameter tag called DBModelId to the given model body.
        Parameters:
        modelBody - The XML model body where the Id parameter will be added.
        modelId - The Id of the model that needs to be inserted.
        Returns:
        The resulting modelBody after inserting the Id to it.

      • intersectResults

        public static java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> intersectResults(java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> previousResults,
                                                               java.util.ArrayList<XMLDBModel> currentResults)
        Intersect the XMLDBModels results from two list, and take the common ones and return them in a new list.
        Parameters:
        previousResults - The list of the first batch of models.
        currentResults - The list of the second batch of models.
        Returns:
        The list of common models from both lists.

      • modelReferenceExists

        public static boolean modelReferenceExists(java.lang.String modelName,
                                           java.lang.String referenceString)
        Check if the model name exists in the given reference string.
        Parameters:
        modelName - Model name to check.
        referenceString - Reference string to check within.
        Returns:
        True if the model name is present within the given reference string, false otherwise.

      • parseXML

        public static org.w3c.dom.Node parseXML(java.lang.String xmlString)
                                 throws XMLDBModelParsingException
        Parse the xml string that is passed to it and return the upper node of that xml.
        Parameters:
        xmlString - The xml string that needs to be parsed
        Returns:
        The upper node for the xml string after parsing it.
        Throws:
        XMLDBModelParsingException - Thrown if a parser exceptions was thrown
